Taos Command Line Interface Package¶

Submodules¶

taos.about module¶

Implementation of biography information from Github for DevOps Now members

taos.about.contact_info()[source]¶
taos.about.get_about(bold=False)[source]¶

Returns the content of the taos about page

taos.about.list_services()[source]¶

taos.bio module¶

Implementation of user fetching from github content

taos.bio.get_user(user: str) → dict[source]¶
taos.bio.is_member(tag)[source]¶
taos.bio.list_persons() → List[str][source]¶

taos.bot module¶

Integration with Slack is provided by this module.

This module uses SLACK_API_TOKEN in order to integrate and interact with Slack

taos.bot.run_bot()[source]¶

taos.cli module¶

git¶

Taos cli command

git [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

about¶

Looking at Taos Who We Are

git about [OPTIONS] [[|managed-cloud-and-infrastructure|hybrid-cloud|devops-
          now|design-and-resolution-engineering|24/7-operations|professional-
          services|cloud-migration|strategy|consulting|end-user-support|cloud-
          expense-management]]

Arguments

LINK¶

Optional argument

bio¶

Lookup Taos personell bio information.

git bio [OPTIONS] [aearl0530|amcchesney-taos|cmorrowTaos|jmiceli-taos|rmeyer-
        taos]

Arguments

USER¶

Required argument

contact¶

git contact [OPTIONS]

subscribe¶

git subscribe [OPTIONS]

Options

--name <name>¶
--email <email>¶
--hours <hours>¶
--length <length>¶
--service-type <service_type>¶

taos.config module¶

Configuration Module:

Config module loads commonly used environment variables for Taos CLI usage

  • TAOS_WEB_USER_AGENT

  • SUPPORT_EMAIL

  • CONTACT_EMAIL

  • CONTACT_ENDPOINT

  • CONTACT_WEB_SITE

  • SEND_GRID_API_KEY

  • SLACK_API_TOKEN

taos.email module¶

Email Module:

Email module provides the ability to send emails to Taos as the client requests them. It requires a SEND_GRID_API_KEY in order to function

taos.email.send_message(email, name, message_type='contact', **kwargs)[source]¶
